comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Franz Ritter Höfer von Feldsturm (de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Franz_H%C3%B6fer_von_Feldsturm, in German). He was the author of the official reports of the Austro-Hungarian Army during WWI. I have no idea why he is here labeled as "Prince", perhaps it's a misinterpretation of his name Franz.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59:  Thanks for providing us with correct name information here.  We will include it next time we update.
